0.text: Innate: Neeko is offered a selection of allied  champions to take their appearance. She can choose a new champion to switch her disguise or select herself to deactivate her disguise, placing Inherent Glamour on a 2-second cooldown.
0.html: Innate: Neeko is offered a selection of allied champions to take their appearance. She can choose a new champion to switch her disguise or select herself to deactivate her disguise, placing Inherent Glamour on a 2-second cooldown.

1.text: While disguised, Neeko can use basic attacks while keeping her form. Taking damage from enemy  champions, using  item actives with cast times, casting  Blooming Burst or  Tangle-Barbs, or performing  Pop Blossom's leap breaks the illusion and puts Inherent Glamour on full  cooldown.
1.html: While disguised, Neeko can use basic attacks while keeping her form. Taking damage from enemy champions, using item actives with cast times, casting Blooming Burst or Tangle-Barbs, or performing Pop Blossom's leap breaks the illusion and puts Inherent Glamour on full  cooldown.

0.text: Active: Neeko tosses a seed that blooms at the target location, dealing magic damage nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Neeko tosses a seed that blooms at the target location, dealing magic damage nearby enemies.

1.text: If the bloom kills an enemy or hits a  champion or large  monster, it will bloom again after 0.75 seconds to deal magic damage. This may occur up to 2 times per cast.
1.html: If the bloom kills an enemy or hits a champion or large monster, it will bloom again after 0.75 seconds to deal magic damage. This may occur up to 2 times per cast.

0.text: Passive: Neeko's basic attacks  on-hit generate a stack of Shapesplitter, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, her next basic attack on-attack is empowered to consume them all to become  non-projectile, deal bonus magic damage and grant her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.
0.html: Passive: Neeko's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Shapesplitter, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, her next basic attack on-attack is empowered to consume them all to become non-projectile, deal bonus magic damage and grant her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.

1.text: Active: Neeko creates a  clone of her  current form, after which they both instantly become  invisible for 0.5 seconds and gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
1.html: Active: Neeko creates a clone of her current form, after which they both instantly become invisible for 0.5 seconds and gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.

2.text: The clone lasts for 3 seconds, and starts running a fixed distance in the target direction. The clone is  untargetable to allies and for the first 0.5 seconds of its lifespan to enemies.
2.html: The clone lasts for 3 seconds, and starts running a fixed distance in the target direction. The clone is untargetable to allies and for the first 0.5 seconds of its lifespan to enemies.

0.text: Active: Neeko slings a magical spiral in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  roots them for a duration.
0.html: Active: Neeko slings a magical spiral in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and roots them for a duration.

1.text: If the spiral hits at least one enemy, it grows in size and its speed and root duration is increased.
1.html: If the spiral hits at least one enemy, it grows in size and its speed and root duration is increased.

0.text: Active: Neeko winds up spiritual essence over 1.25 seconds and highlights the area around herself, which is visible to enemies unless Neeko is  disguised.
0.html: Active: Neeko winds up spiritual essence over 1.25 seconds and highlights the area around herself, which is visible to enemies unless Neeko is disguised.

1.text: After winding up, the cast time begins and Neeko leaps into the air, gaining a  shield for 2 seconds that is increased for each nearby enemy  champion.
1.html: After winding up, the cast time begins and Neeko leaps into the air, gaining a shield for 2 seconds that is increased for each nearby enemy champion.

2.text: When the cast time ends, she lands to emit a burst of energy that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  stuns them for 1.25 seconds.
2.html: When the cast time ends, she lands to emit a burst of energy that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and stuns them for 1.25 seconds.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Glaciate: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and  slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are  rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

0.concerningText: Passive: Neeko's basic attacks  on-hit generate a stack of Shapesplitter, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, her next basic attack on-attack consumes them all to turn her attack  non-projectile, deal bonus magic damage and grant her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.

origin.concerningText: If the spiral hits at least one enemy, it grows in size and its speed and root duration is increased.

0.concerningText: Active: Neeko slings a magical spiral in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  roots them for a duration.
